title: Real NFT-Gallery & voting tool
description: Art-NFTs exist only virtually and their art can't be easily shown / displayed & As native assets, no revenue besides sale exists for artists
solution: We'll be the first Cardano-NFT gallery in Berlin, online & other cities, where NFT-holders & artists get payed (ADA) by votes of visitors.
experience: I am a Plutus Pioneer Dev Cohort 2 and released a successful NFT-project on Cardano in April. The rest of the team will be recruited.
